message.entry: {0} The derivative function ODEFUN must be a function_handle.
{0} The boundary condition function BCFUN must be a function_handle.
{0} The initial profile SOLINIT must be provided as a structure.
{0} The field ''x'' not present in SOLINIT.
{0} The field ''y'' not present in SOLINIT.
{0} SOLINIT.x must contain at least the two end points.
{0} The entries in SOLINIT.x must increase or decrease.
{0} No initial guess provided in SOLINIT.y.
{0} The derivative function ODEFUN should return a column vector of length {1,number,integer}.
{0} The boundary condition function BCFUN should return a column vector of length {1,number,integer}.
{0} RelTol in OPTIONS must be a positive scalar.
{0} RelTol in OPTIONS has been increased to {1}.
{0} For this problem AbsTol in OPTIONS must be a scalar or a vector of length {1,number,integer}.
{0} AbsTol in OPTIONS must be positive.
